reviews.text:
We had a record breaking rainfall the day after my pool was cleaned. Then, we had more rain on the weekend. My pool was as blue as could be! It’s a Christmas miracle. No, our technician Chris Martin is a miracle! 😉

Claffey Pools and Chris have been the best pool service we have hired. Chris is faithfully here on our clean day every week. He puts in the time and effort to ensure our pool is looking good and functioning well. When we have had issues with our pool, the service team has pulled thro

Jason, Kyle, and Duffy were an absolute pleasure to work with. They not only answered all our questions but also went above and beyond to ensure we felt confident throughout the process. Everything was handled promptly and professionally, and they were always responsive when we reached out. Their insight and expertise were truly invaluable as we repaired our pool. We’re grateful for their support and look forward to working with Claffey again in the future.

The entire process, from start to finish, was fantastic. Everyone involved, Jasen, Mike, Sue, and all the others, were pleasant and professional. The pool turned out to be as beautiful as expected. Claffey built our pool 22 years ago and we made another good decision to have Claffey replaster the pool.

So glad I called Claffey to do repairs on my pool! Jason and Kyle were awesome. The attention to detail was superb….and I’m pretty picky!
Thank you for taking pride in your work! Awesome job!!

Talk about a total transformation! Claffey took our dated and run down back yard and turned it into a beautiful oasis. They remodeled our existing pool and built a new cabana. No detail was too small and every step was overseen with great care.  We were so grateful for Shawn. His amazing attention to detail and availability are truly invaluable.  He made this very long (9 months) project tolerable.  Would highly recommend Claffey, Shawn, and every worker who contributed for any project.

Claffey Pool remodel removed and then installed a new pool slide and diving board. They did a great job from communicating by email or text to the job itself and follow up. Thanks to Jasen, Ryan, Gerrado and the crew!
John is my technician and he does a great job! Very attentive and detailed.  We just renovated our pool and couldn’t be more pleased!

Excellent service from start to finish! Mike walked me thru the selections with his expertise, Sue kept me informed at all times, and Jasen is just  the perfect project manager! Such a pleasure to watch craftsmen working, happy the outcome achieved all I had in mind, and probably the best expenditure of my money for the services received! A long time Claffey customer and will continue to be so! Nice to get something done without issue or question and amazing results!
Thank you Claffey Inc😊

We are very happy with our recently completed Claffey pool. From the very beginning, working with Shelly then Jeremiah and Joel was a great experience. Everyone was knowledgeable, pleasant, helpful and available. The attention to detail and quality of work was fantastic. We can’t recommend Claffey Pools highly enough.

Claffey built our pool at the end of last year and did an outstanding job — the quality of construction and equipment has been excellent. This summer, as our pool water started climbing into the 90–92° range, Claffey guided us through selecting and installing a Jandy chiller/heat pump to complement our gas heater. The new system has been a game-changer for keeping the water comfortable during hot NTX summers.

Special thanks to Eric and Whit for their phenomenal work during installation — they w

It was time to replace our lighting of our Claffey Pool. Audrey was so awesome in working with us and getting it scheduled. Justin H and Ryan called and arrived ahead of schedule and did a fantastic job! They were competent, friendly, discussed the process and taught us allot! Thank you Claffey Team!

I highly recommend Claffey Pools.  I appreciate how much they care about their customers, especially Rob.
Claffey Pools recently built my beautiful pool. Throughtout the building process, their team was very professional and caring.

I am very thankful about the way that Rob and the Claffey team responded to fix a very unusual problem with my pool. The problem turned out to be very complex to solve. Claffey brought the required experts, including experienced engineers to make sure the problem wa

We recently had Claffey Pools remodel our pool. They did a phenomenal job start to finish! Excellent service started with Mike at the office where we picked out our finish stone and tile. Jason took over at the job site. Jason is the perfect job site coordinator, he listens patiently and makes certain the customer is happy.

Our original pool wiring recently shorted out against the box and burnt the wiring.  Although our pool and some plumbing had been update, all wiring was original and very old.  When contacted Claffey Pools was able to send someone out within a couple days.  The technician/electrician, Eric, was very knowledgeable and agreed that it would be best to replace all the wiring.  Eric was able to complete the job and test all systems in a couple hours.  Claffey Pools and their staff offer great, timely

Claffey Pools built our pool back in 2006, did a wonderful job and 18 years later it still looks great.  So when it was time for a few stone touch-ups, we immediately called them.

Mike Moore, the remodel design consultant, came to our home, was incredibly kind and patient with all our questions and gave us a good estimate for the work.  Sue Hennessey, the remodel administrator, was equally friendly and professional making sure we were immediately up to date with all the paperwork for our projec

I had the pleasure of working with Jasen Kidd and Duffy Hennessy from Claffey Pools. Jasen helped me set up my Jandy automation and Duffy designed a beautiful pool for the families enjoyment for years to come.  Thank you Claffey Pools

Ryan was very thorough with the explanation of the new Aqua Link controller installed today. He took the time to get their apps properly downloaded on both my wife’s and I‘s phones, and was patient in walking us through all the variables. Our experience with Claffey since we switched to them recently as our primary pool service provider has been Excellent!

Claffey review
Where to begin?! My wife and I had heard several pool construction nightmares prior to receiving quotes for a new pool build and after researching companies, Claffey seemed to have the reputation we were looking for.

The impression made from the beginning was outstanding and started with Erin who quickly responded to us and worked around our schedules to come up with a design from scratch. We had ideas for our outdoor living space and she brought it to life more beautiful than we
John from Claffey did a great job on our pool today.  He took the time to brush, vacuum and clean everything.  It looks awesome.  Hope I get to keep him!

Claffey Pools are the best! Starting with Kyle who helped us choose a redo design, to Sean Scoggins and Jason the on-site managers, to every member of the crew, the attention to detail and commitment to excellence is outstanding! We highly recommend Claffey Pools!
